Header: MLT Troops Listen to Lecture ‘HIV & AIDS’
Content: 110 plus troops, including those from the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) listened to a lecture on ‘HIV & AIDS’ following initiatives taken by the Commander, Security Forces - Mullaittivu, Major General Jayantha Senavirathna on Wednesday (4) at the SFHQ-MLT auditorium. This lecture was conducted by Lieutenant T.M.N.S Thennakoon, Medical Officer at the Army Base Hospital - Mullaittivu together with his staff.
